name: FetchSim
description: Fetch a Sim resource on your Account.

Sid.description: The SID or the `unique_name` of the Sim resource to fetch.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) to which the Sim resource belongs.
**commands_callback_method**: The HTTP method we use to call `commands_callback_url`.  Can be: `POST` or `GET`. Default is `POST`.

**commands_callback_url**: The URL we call using the `commands_callback_method` when the SIM originates a machine-to-machine [Command](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iot/wireless/api/command-resource). Your server should respond with an HTTP status code in the 200 range; any response body will be ignored.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the Sim resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html) format.
**e_id**: Deprecated.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the Sim resource.
**iccid**: The [ICCID](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SIM_card#ICCID) associated with the SIM.
**ip_address**: Deprecated.
**links**: The URLs of related subresources.
**rate_plan_sid**: The SID of the [RatePlan resource](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iot/wireless/api/rateplan-resource) to which the Sim resource is assigned.
**reset_status**
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the Sim resource.
**sms_fallback_method**: Deprecated.
**sms_fallback_url**: Deprecated.
**sms_method**: Deprecated.
**sms_url**: Deprecated.
**status**
**unique_name**: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource. It can be used in place of the resource's `sid` in the URL to address the resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the resource.
**voice_fallback_method**: Deprecated. The HTTP method we use to call `voice_fallback_url`. Can be: `GET` or `POST`. Default is `POST`.
**voice_fallback_url**: Deprecated. The URL we call using the `voice_fallback_method` when an error occurs while retrieving or executing the TwiML requested from `voice_url`.
**voice_method**: Deprecated. The HTTP method we use to call `voice_url`. Can be: `GET` or `POST`. Default is `POST`.
**voice_url**: Deprecated. The URL we call using the `voice_method` when the SIM-connected device makes a voice call.
